entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 5:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:18 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
